mapper.select:
select a.SerialNo, a.LinkmanName, a.Phone, a.StartStation, a.StartCityId, a.EndCityId, a.StartCityName StartCity, a.EndCityName EndCity, (select c.DicCode from ecs_dic_system c where c.DicValue = a.TripType) tripName, a.Destination, a.CartBrand, a.TripType, a.CarNumber, a.SeatTotal, a.SeatRemain, a.Price, date_format(a.StartTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')StartTime, a.Remark from ecu_trip_driver a where a.IsEffective= '1'
and a.StartCityName like CONCAT('%',#{pd.startCity},'%')
and a.EndCityName like CONCAT('%',#{pd.endCity},'%')
and a.TripType = #{pd.tripType}
and date_format(a.StartTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') >= #{pd.curTime}
and ((a.Phone like concat('%',#{pd.searchPar},'%')) or (a.LinkmanName like concat('%',#{pd.searchPar},'%')) or (a.StartCityName like concat('%',#{pd.searchPar},'%')) or (a.EndCityName like concat('%',#{pd.searchPar},'%')) or (a.StartStation like concat('%',#{pd.searchPar},'%')) or (a.Destination like concat('%',#{pd.searchPar},'%')) or (a.Price like concat('%',#{pd.searchPar},'%')) or (a.Remark like concat('%',#{pd.searchPar},'%')) )
order by a.PublishTime desc

select a.LinkmanName, a.Phone, a.StartStation, a.StartCityId, a.EndCityId, a.StartCityName StartCity, a.EndCityName EndCity, (select c.DicCode from ecs_dic_system c where c.DicValue = a.TripType) tripName, a.Destination, a.CartBrand, a.TripType, a.CarNumber, a.SeatTotal, a.SeatRemain, a.Price, e.Nickname, e.Headimgurl, e.Sex, date_format(a.StartTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')StartTime, a.Remark from ecu_trip_driver a left join ecu_user e on a.LinkmanId = e.userId where a.SerialNo=#{serialNo}
mapper.insert: insert into ecu_trip_driver ( SerialNo, LinkmanName, LinkmanId, Phone, StartCityId, StartStation, StartCityName, EndCityName, EndCityId, Destination, Byway, CartBrand, SeatTotal, Price, StartTime, Remark, SeatRemain, tripType, PublishTime ) values ( #{SerialNo}, #{LinkmanName}, #{UserId}, #{Phone}, #{StartCityId}, #{StartStation}, #{StartCityName}, #{EndCityName}, #{EndCityId}, #{Destination}, #{Byway}, #{CartBrand}, #{SeatTotal}, #{Price}, #{StartTime}, #{Remark}, #{SeatTotal}, #{TripType}, now() )

insert into ecu_user ( userId, Openid, Nickname, Sex, Headimgurl, CityId, ProvinceId, CountryId, unionId, RegistTime )values( #{userId}, #{openId}, #{nickName}, #{gender}, #{avatarUrl}, #{city}, #{province}, #{country}, #{unionid}, now() )
mapper.select: select a.SerialNo from ecu_trip_driver a where a.IsEffective='1' and a.LinkmanId = #{UserId} and a.Phone=#{Phone} and date_format(a.StartTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H')=date_format(#{StartTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H')
select a.SerialNo from ecu_trip_driver a where a.IsEffective='1' and a.LinkmanId = #{UserId} and date_format(a.PublishTime,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.insert: insert into ecu_mid_trip_user ( TripSerialNo, UserId, RegDate )values( #{SerialNo}, #{UserId}, now(); )
mapper.update:
update ecu_trip_driver a set
a.SeatRemain = a.SeatRemain-1
a.SeatRemain = a.SeatRemain+1
where a.SerialNo = #{SerialNo}
mapper.select:
select a.SerialNo, a.LinkmanName, a.Phone, a.StartStation, a.StartCityId, a.EndCityId, a.StartCityName StartCity, a.EndCityName EndCity, (select c.DicCode from ecs_dic_system c where c.DicValue = a.TripType) tripName, a.Destination, a.CartBrand, a.TripType, a.CarNumber, a.SeatTotal, a.SeatRemain, a.Price, date_format(a.StartTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')StartTime, a.Remark from ecu_trip_driver a where a.IsEffective= '1' and a.SerialNo in (select b.TripSerialNo from ecu_mid_trip_user b where b.IsEffective = '1' and b.UserId=#{UserId})
and date_format(a.StartTime,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format(#{pd.StartTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
order by a.StartTime desc
select a.* from ecu_mid_trip_user a where a.TripSerialNo=#{SerialNo} and a.UserId=#{UserId}
